feed.title: SCRIMMAGE
feed.subtitle: Simulating Collaborative Robots in Massive Multi-Agent Game Execution, or SCRIMMAGE, provides a flexible simulation environment for the experimentation and testing of novel mobile robotics algorithms.

entry.title: Website Built with Jekyll.
entry.content: The SCRIMMAGE website was moved from WordPress to Jekyll to reduce complexity. The website isn’t deployed automatically yet, but it will be soon. This will allow developers to update the website via git commits and pull requests. We will eventually move the hosting of these static html pages from BlueHost to GitHub Pages.
entry.summary: The SCRIMMAGE website was moved from WordPress to Jekyll to reduce complexity. The website isn’t deployed automatically yet, but it will be soon.
